title: Asking for a professional reference
context: Ask a former boss if you can list them as a contact on your resume.

content.bestLine: May I list you as a reference on my resume?

neutral.text: Can I use you as a reference?
Would you be willing to vouch for me?
Can I list your name on my job applications?
May I include your contact information?
Would you be a professional reference for me?
Can you serve as a reference for my job search?
May I mention your name to potential employers?
Can I use your name as a job reference?

formal.text: I would be grateful if you could serve as a professional reference.
May I have your permission to list you as a reference?
Would you be willing to provide a professional endorsement?
I would appreciate it if you could vouch for my skills and experience.
May I include your name and contact information on my resume?
I would be honored if you would agree to be a professional reference.

options: use your name as a reference
patterns.meaning: requesting permission to use someone as a reference

options: vouch for my skills and experience
patterns.meaning: requesting someone to act as a reference

dialogs.description: Requesting a reference from a former boss

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hi, I hope you're doing well. I'm reaching out because I'm currently looking for a new job and I was wondering if I could list you as a professional reference?

lines.speaker: Former Boss
lines.text: Of course, I'd be happy to serve as a reference for you. What kind of job are you looking for?

dialogs.description: Asking a former supervisor for a reference

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hi, I wanted to touch base with you about my job search. Would you be willing to provide a professional reference for me?

lines.speaker: Former Supervisor
lines.text: Yes, I'd be happy to help. What's the best way for me to provide the reference?
